com.elsevier.xml

Class XQueryProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elsevier.xml.XQueryProcessor

  • public class XQueryProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with static methods to apply an XQuery expression against a string of arbitrary xml content.
    Author:
    Darin McBeath

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> prefixesNamespaces)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Init the NamespaceContext. Set the prefix to namespace mappings specified in the passed HashMap.
        Parameters:
        prefixesNamespaces - HashMap of namespace prefix / namespace uri mappings
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Clear namespace prefix / namespace uri mappings. Useful if you want to use a different set of prefix/namespace mappings.

      • evaluateString

        public static java.lang.String evaluateString(java.lang.String content,
                              java.lang.String xqueryExpression)
        Apply the xqueryExpression to the specified string and return a serialized response.
        Parameters:
        content - String to which the xqueryExpression will be applied
        xqueryExpression - XQuery expression to apply to the content
        Returns:
        Serialized response from the evaluation. If an error, the response will be "".
